object.name: savePreparedInlineMessage
object.description: Stores a message that can be sent by a user of a Mini App. Returns a PreparedInlineMessage object.
object.html_description: Stores a message that can be sent by a user of a Mini App. Returns a PreparedInlineMessage object.
object.rst_description: Stores a message that can be sent by a user of a Mini App. Returns a :class:`aiogram.types.prepared_inline_message.PreparedInlineMessage` object.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user that can use the prepared message
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the target user that can use the prepared message
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user that can use the prepared message
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object describing the message to be sent
annotations.name: result

annotations.description: Pass True if the message can be sent to private chats with users
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message can be sent to private chats with users
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message can be sent to private chats with users
annotations.name: allow_user_chats

annotations.description: Pass True if the message can be sent to private chats with bots
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message can be sent to private chats with bots
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message can be sent to private chats with bots
annotations.name: allow_bot_chats

annotations.description: Pass True if the message can be sent to group and supergroup chats
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message can be sent to group and supergroup chats
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message can be sent to group and supergroup chats
annotations.name: allow_group_chats

annotations.description: Pass True if the message can be sent to channel chats
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the message can be sent to channel chats
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the message can be sent to channel chats
annotations.name: allow_channel_chats
